settings.title: 5 Reasons Why Thousands Are Switching to Super Tallow for Their Skincare Routine
settings.subtitle: Discover why one simple ingredient is replacing complicated skincare routines everywhere.

settings.title: 1. Super Tallow Heals Skin Faster Than Traditional Moisturizers
settings.content:
Super Tallow contains vitamin E, known for its ability to speed up skin healing, reduce redness, and prevent scarring.

Whether you're dealing with scratches, dry patches, or sensitive areas, this single-ingredient solution works to restore and protect your skin naturally.

Its nutrient-rich formula ensures that even the most delicate skin heals quickly and stays nourished.

settings.title: 2. Provides Natural Hydration That Lasts All Day
settings.content:
Super Tallow’s natural fatty acids mimic your skin’s own oils, delivering deep hydration that lasts all day without feeling greasy.

Unlike water-based moisturizers that evaporate quickly, Super Tallow locks in moisture and keeps your skin soft and dewy.

Even in harsh weather conditions, your skin remains hydrated and protected.

settings.title: 3. Super Tallow has Hundreds of Benefits with Just One Ingredient
settings.content:
Super Tallow is packed with vitamins A, D, E, and K, each essential for maintaining healthy, radiant skin.

It nourishes, repairs, and strengthens your skin barrier, helping reduce inflammation, promote cell regeneration, and prevent dryness.

It’s safe for sensitive skin and babies, and the best part? It has only ONE ingredient, the highest possible-quality tallow.

settings.title: 4. Super Tallow Delivers Visible Results in Days, Not Weeks
settings.content:
With Super Tallow, you’ll notice softer, more hydrated skin, reduced redness, and faster healing in just days.

Its nutrient-dense formula penetrates deeply and provides immediate relief and lasting benefits.

Whether you’re dealing with dry patches, redness, or sensitive skin, Super Tallow works quickly to give you the glowing, healthy skin you deserve.

settings.title: 5. Super Tallow Replaces Multiple Skincare Products in Your Routine
settings.content:
Tired of using separate products for hydration, healing, and skin protection? Super Tallow does it all with just one ingredient.

Instead of cluttering your shelf with multiple moisturizers, serums, and creams, you can simplify your skincare routine and still achieve better results.

Super Tallow saves you time, money, and hassle – giving your skin everything it needs in one jar, with one ingredient.
I've always been wary of conventional skin care products due to their long list of unrecognizable ingredients. I feel very fortunate to have found this product. Thank you for bringing it to market!

settings.question: What is tallow?
settings.answer: Tallow is a single-ingredient moisturizer that has been used for thousands of years. It is sourced from the fatty tissue of cows, and is rich in vitamins A, D, E, and K. Tallow has a lipid profile similar to that of human skin, so it is easily absorbed and nourishing to the skin barrier.

settings.question: What makes Super Tallow™ "super"?
settings.answer: Super Tallow™ is incredibly high quality tallow. It has a luxe texture & consistency, is 100% unscented, and is sourced from the best sustainable farms. We believe that grass-fed, grass-finished, happy cows make the best tallow. If you have tried other tallow products, you will see a night and day difference versus Super Tallow™.

settings.question: Does it have a smell?
settings.answer: No. Our tallow is completely unscented. You may pick up a 'beefy' scent using other tallow products, but not Super Tallow™.

settings.question: Does it cause breakouts?
settings.answer: No! Tallow is non-comedogenic, meaning is does not clog pores.

settings.question: When should I use it?
settings.answer: Any time your skin feels like it needs nourishment or is dry. Fit it into your daily routine however works best for you - some people love Super Tallow™ in their morning routine, some in their evening routine, and some in both!

settings.question: How should I store it?
settings.answer: Tallow is naturally shelf-stable at room temperature, and does not need to be refrigerated. The texture & consistency will change in cold & heat, so try to store it at ~70 degrees.

settings.question: Where can I get support?
settings.answer: Email hello@momonaskin.com and we will be happy to support however we can!

settings.question: Is it baby/pregnancy-safe?
settings.answer: Yes! Super Tallow™ is safe to use during pregnancy, breastfeeding, and on your baby.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: We do! Please bear with us as we try to get international shipping rates down.

settings.question: How much should I use?
settings.answer: A little goes a long way. We recommend a pea-to-penny sized amount. If you feel greasy, you are using too much.
